name: Resume Workshop
description: Come get advice from recruiters to prepare for your next software engineering internship or job!

name: Recruitment Dinner
description: Sit down and enjoy a catered meal with industry recruiters. This is a great opportunity to network! Register here before spots run out! You must pay your dues before attending the event. Recruiters are coming from Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, Lucid, Fast Enterprises, Microsoft, Melaleuca, Chief Architect, Epic, Simple Nexus, ExxonMobil, and Goldman Sachs.

name: Programming Competition
description: This is a contest between BYU, USU, and the U of U. Check back for updates as we get closer to the event. Register here!

name: TheYHack
description: TheYHack is BYU's first 24-hour Hackathon! See the event page for more information!

name: Closing Social
description: This will be the last event of the semester.

name: Pirate Challenge
description: A series of difficult challenges for the summer designed to test your skills! Finish all of them for a prize.
